Welcome to the Dark Arts of Salary Negotiation – Episode 2: The Bait and Shift
Ever feel like the job you applied for somehow shapeshifted mid-interview? Like it started off as a sweet remote role with decent pay and ended as a hybrid grindfest with vague promises and an underwhelming salary? Yeah... that's not a coincidence.

In this video, I break down one of the most manipulative salary negotiation tactics I've seen on the rise lately: The Bait and Shift.

This is where companies dangle your dream role in front of you, love
title: SALARY NEGOTIATION - THE BAIT AND "SHIFT"
